6 Million peeks a month
‘Did I get my salary?’ ‘Has my student loan payment gone through?’ It feels good to peek at your balance to ‘just make sure.’ Peek balance is one of our most popular features. But it wasn’t always so. In fact, in the beginning no one liked it—our users or our stakeholders. But the user behaviour we had observed told a different story. So we kept at it. And it worked out.

“This was a big change for us — to redesign and build the app from ground up. It was a good oppurtunity to simplify and to design with intention.”

JunHan Sim

Product Designer
